title: Nerf Miss Fortune please.
body:
so tired of this freelo champ.

"100% Total AD Scaling auto attacks"


lol k

replies.body: Every character in the game, of every role, has 100% AD scaling with their auto attacks. :\
psst, I think he might be trolling
I never leave out the possibility of unmitigated ignorance.

> [{quoted}](name=BranchofSin5580,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=k0sN6cLd,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-30T14:42:58.545+0000)
>
> so tired of this freelo champ.
> 
> "100% Total AD Scaling auto attacks"
> 
> 
> lol k

http://weknowmemes.com/generator/uploads/generated/g1352490465417870247.jpg
Win rate doest'n mean nothing... She is not OP or freelo champ, but the WR is a simply stadistic data...

> [{quoted}](name=Venowolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=k0sN6cLd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-30T16:18:30.209+0000)
>
> Win rate doest'n mean nothing... She is not OP or freelo champ, but the WR is a simply stadistic data...

Oh good it doesn't mean nothing - so that means it means something.  Thanks!
She's ridic. Her auto attacks outscale every other champion with those ridic ratios on them. #nerfMF2015
